overview:
Vikram R Ghotgalkar

Vikram Ghotgalkar is an Engineer in Computer Science from the Pune Institute of Computer Technology with a strong inclination towards the online medium. At the age of just 19, he was a partner in GreenGrass Design, a web technology and consultancy firm, wherein he handled print media and design. GreenGrass Design worked on re-branding the online presence of popular entities including Jalebee Cartel (India’s biggest New Age Electronica band) and DesiCrew.in ( An award winning rural BPO ). The young organization grew fast enough to take away business from established marketing firms.

During his final year of engineering he worked with Tibco(India) to develop an algorithm for and later implementation of a fuzzy logic based, smart search engine. On completion of his Bachelors in Engineering he went on to work with Pinstorm Technologies, Asia’s largest search-engine marketing company as an Algorithm Architect.

During his term at Pinstorm, Vikram played a major role in the development of an Automated Search Engine Marketing Tool, which was designed for low costs and large volumes. He also helped in developing algorithms and methods for the increasing of efficiency and the reduction of cost - every marketers dream!
